review: at least let us download the latest patch of this game.... downloaded game to have to download a 8 gig patch...

Forgetting gaming for a few seconds, if you like Blues Rock, then the cost of this game is justified based on the soundtracks alone. The Game is a Bonus.the  game reminds me of Spaz ( Spare Pirates and Zombies ) with a different camera view and in 3D  without the zombies....worth a playthrough
I glad they are testing how many hacks can run on this thing, awesome work
What you always wanted out of your lego set! highly recommend
